name: The Frost Rebirth
storyline: The game takes place in mountains covered with snow, trees and caves. They are inhabited by creatures far from civilization, ready to kill anyone but them. You went expedition and got lost. In this area, the main task is to survive. You need to look for or get food, water, equipment, defend against savages, build shelters and look for weapons to protect yourself. This place holds many secrets, and you need to reveal everything. This will help you survive and get out of these mountains alive. But you need to be attentive to details, notes and tips. They will help you get out of this ice trap.
summary: First person shooter in which you need to search for weapons, food, equipment and explore the territory of the mountains. There are only two main tasks, survive and find your way home. You need to look for clues that will lead you out of this area.
